themes: impact of funding changes on organizations
loss of opportunities for artists and underrepresented groups
call for adherence to official guidelines
key_phrases: Go back to using the HOT funds as they are supposed to be used
encourage tourism and not this new agenda
caused organizations to have to close
gave so many opportunities to up and coming artists and platforms for underrepresented people

barriers_identified: funding changes causing organizations to close
loss of support for up and coming artists
loss of platforms for underrepresented people
solutions_proposed: Return to using HOT funds according to official guidelines
Focus HOT funds on encouraging tourism
